lessons.japanese: バカンスに行くのが待ち遠しい。
lessons.english: I can't wait to go on a vacation.

lessons.japanese: バカンスに行くのが待ち遠しい。
lessons.english: I can't wait to go on a vacation.

lessons.japanese: 金曜日のパーティーが待ち遠しいよ。
lessons.english: We can hardly wait for the party on Friday.

lessons.japanese: 学生たちは夏休みが来るのが待ち遠しい。
lessons.english: Students are impatient for the summer holidays to come.

lessons.japanese: 花見ができる春が待ち遠しい。
lessons.english: I can't wait for spring to come so we can sit under the cherry trees.

lessons.japanese: 夏休みが待ち遠しいです。
lessons.english: I look forward to the summer vacation.

lessons.japanese: コブ女史が帰ってくる日が待ち遠しいよ。ほんとに。
lessons.english: I'm looking forward to the day when Miss Cobb comes back, I can tell you.

lessons.japanese: 彼は彼女の到着が待ち遠しい。
lessons.english: He is impatient for her arrival.

lessons.japanese: 金曜日のパーティーが待ち遠しいよ。
lessons.english: We can hardly wait for the party on Friday.

lessons.japanese: 学生たちは夏休みが来るのが待ち遠しい。
lessons.english: Students are impatient for the summer holidays to come.

lessons.japanese: 花見ができる春が待ち遠しい。
lessons.english: I can't wait for spring to come so we can sit under the cherry trees.

lessons.japanese: コブ女史が帰ってくる日が待ち遠しいよ。ほんとに。
lessons.english: I'm looking forward to the day when Miss Cobb comes back, I can tell you.

lessons.japanese: 夏休みがすごく待ち遠しいよ。
lessons.english: I'm really longing for summer vacation.

lessons.japanese: 彼は彼女の到着が待ち遠しい。
lessons.english: He is impatient for her arrival.

lessons.japanese: バレンタインが待ち遠しい！
lessons.english: I can't wait for Valentine's Day!
